item.title: Board work session gives new supt, members look at OKCPS health
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The Oklahoma City Public Schools Board of Education work session Tuesday was packed with presentations to bring board members up to date and to brief newly-hired Superintendent Sean McDaniel. *See updated information below that was added the next day after publication. These are notes taken as the meeting progressed. They are sketch notes taken during […]

item.title: OKCPS board work session clarifies superintendent search
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Oklahoma City Public Schools Board of Education members met Monday in a work session with Oklahoma State School Boards Association staff to define what they want in the next superintendent. Gloria Torres was the only member not in attendance due to being out of the country. Process Members processed what they thought a successful district […]

The post OKCPS board work session clarifies superintendent search appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Long work session focused on planning, strategy, bonds
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The Oklahoma City Public Schools Board of Education met Monday for an official work session in the superintendent’s conference room to discuss a wide range of issues and plans. The meeting lasted for about 4 hours, but at the end board members leaving for home seemed relaxed and satisfied with the work they put in. […]

The post Long work session focused on planning, strategy, bonds appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
